title: Didnt get the 10 year anniversary gift
body: I still waited until 23th September and still didnt get the gift. Please Riot help me plsssss{{champion:32}}

replies.body: We're continuing to provide updates on our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), currently set to the 30th.  There are a lot of accounts to gifts, including the next wave for recently played summoners.  Hang tight!
